source:
key=str(input("enter the product key:"))
name=str(input("enter name:"))
category=str(input("enter category:"))
expiry=input("enter expiry:")
quantity=input("enter quantity:")
prize=input("enter prize:")

record[key]={"name":name,"category":category,"expiry":expiry,"quantity":quantity,"prize":prize}

js=json.dumps(record)

fd=open("record.json","w")
        
fd.write(js)

fd.close()
